typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string,
		indicator as string,
		daily_count as string,
		date as string,
		rate_14_day as string,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> readingdata
readingdata filter(continent=='Europe' && not(isNull(country_code))) ~> filterEuropeanData
filterEuropeanData select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code,
		population,
		indicator,
		daily_count,
		source,
		each(match(name == 'date'),
			'reported'+'_date' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectCertainColumns
selectCertainColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string
	),
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> storingData
